rukus.text: 'ina 'aetaynak -ayha alnby- alkhayr alkthyr fi aldunya walakhrt, wamin dhlk nahr alkawthar fi aljanat aldhy haftah khyam alluwlu almjwwaf, wtynh almsk
fakhls lirabik salatak klha, wadhbh dhbyhtk lah waealaa aismuh whdh
'in mbghdk wmbghd ma jit bih min alhudaa walnwr, hu almnqte athrh, almqtwe min kuli khyr
